messages.title: A strong MP fighting your corner makes all the difference
messages.content: People are always asking me 'don't you ever stop?' but why would I? Making a difference for people in our city is the best job in the world.

messages.title: If the Tories win here, there'll be no one to stand up against cuts to our schools
messages.content: Lilian Greenwood: a strong voice for local families.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I'll speak out against Tory cuts until Nottingham's NHS has the resources it needs.
I'll campaign against Tory cuts to Nottinghamshire Police. We need more Police Officers to prevent crime and anti-social behaviour.
Everyone deserves a home of their own. That's why I'll always campaign for more decent, affordable homes.
Whoever is Prime Minister I'll fight for the best deal for everyone in Nottingham South.

issues.education: If the Tories win here, there'll be no one to stand up against cuts to our schools.
issues.health: I'll speak out against Tory cuts until Nottingham's NHS has the resources it needs.

housing.content: Everyone deserves a home of their own. That's why I'll always campaign for more decent, affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: People are always asking me 'don't you ever stop?' but why would I? Making a difference for people in our city is the best job in the world.

images.caption: Lilian Greenwood with various groups of people, including children holding signs opposing school cuts.
